timeline.bodyText: Why the serialize and deserialize are not symmetric?
timeline.author: chtyim

replies.bodyText: serialization will serialize logical types as string. For deserialize in preview mode, we would always want logical type fields as string. However, that does not comply with avro schema. Meaning, for non preview we would want structured records to contain original primitive types(not string) for logical type fields.
